any additional information: Use of distillery wastewater as growth medium.
Tested different carbon sources including glucose.
Laccase activity tested every 48 hours; first synthesis period after glucose addition was 6.1 days.
2,5-xylidine added before inoculation; highest laccase activity achieved was 8419 units/L.
Tested copper addition for its effect on laccase synthesis.
Simultaneous addition resulted in the greatest increase in laccase synthesis.
